TEXT: A sorcerer whose power stems from the The [#7c0060]Dark [#7c0060]Ones[]. NL Shades use their own bodies as conduits, granting these spirits a doorway to our world.
NL You unleash your magic upon the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~empty~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
